page.title: 13PARISH CHURCH OF ST. ANDREW
page.content: The first record of a church in the village of Okeford Fitzpaine is in 1302, although the present church dates from 1866. It was almost entirely rebuilt using much of the materials of the original church. The tower,hoever, dates from an earlier time, the lower part possibly from 1302. Rev.Pomeroy is the rector of four churches, Okeford Fitzpaine, Ibberton, Belchalwell and Woolland. He has been a vicar for 19 years and became ordained because,he said,"I felt God wanted me to." He is helped in the parish by Rev. Walter who is an honorary curate. He sees his job as understanding people's prblems and helping them to understand God.
